name: City of McKinney Curbside Recycling
materials: Aluminum Cans; Brown Paper Bags; Cardboard; Catalogs; Computer Paper; Glass (Brown); Glass (Clear); Glass (Green); Magazines; Newspapers; Office Paper; Paper (Mixed); Phone books; Plastic #1 (PETE); Plastic #2 (HDPE); Plastic #3 (PVC); Plastic #4 (LDPE); Plastic #5 (Polypropylene); Plastic #7; Tin or Steel Cans
notes: The City of McKinney offers an automated recycling collection system that uses a blue 65 gallon recycling cart. Recycling collection is on the same day as your trash collection. Be sure to place your recycling cart approximately three feet from your trash cart.

name: Bulky Item Collection
description: Progressive Waste Solutions Bulky  Item Collection
materials: Furniture; Large Household Appliances; Scrap Metal
notes: To schedule a bulky items collection, call 469-452-8000 at least one day prior to your regular trash collection day.  Bulky items are defined as items that can be loaded by two people in less than 5 minutes, and will be picked up at each residence up to 12 times per year at no charge.

name: McKinney Household Hazardous Waste Collection
materials: Aerosol Spray Cans; Antifreeze; Batteries (Rechargeable); Brake Fluid; Compact Fluorescent Lights; Cooking Oil; Fluorescent Lamps/Tubes; Fungicides; Gasoline and Unwanted Fuels; Herbicides; Household Cleaners; Insecticides; Latex Paint; Lead Acid (Pb) Batteries; Mercury Containing Items; Oil-Based Paint; Paint Thinner; Pesticides; Photography Chemicals; Pool Chemicals; Solvents; Transmission Fluid; Used Motor Oil
notes: Call for an Appointment at 972-547-7385 or order a HHW pickup online. Household Hazardous Waste Collection  occurs on your regular trash and recycling collection day. For residents of McKinney, there is no additional fee for this service. Commercial waste will not be accepted at any time.
